rows.label: qst100902_msg0002
rows.name: Therida's alive! Alive, I tell you!

rows.label: qst100902_msg0003
rows.name:
Come on, Therida. Get up.
Please, Therida!
Oh, what am I going to...

rows.label: qst100902_msg0004
rows.name:
Thanks...
Hang on though...what was
meant to be the herb for...?

rows.label: qst100902_msg0006
rows.name:
I think Therida once told me
you could use Amethyst Vanilla
to bring someone round!

rows.label: qst100902_msg0007
rows.name:
Maybe if you brought me some
Amethyst Vanilla...
